name: BanOnLeave
short: Automatically bans users that leave the server.
description: This cog automatically bans users that leave the server. It can be useful for preventing raiders or spammers from rejoining the server after being kicked or banned.
end_user_data_statement: This cog does not store any user data persistently.
install_msg:
Thanks for installing BanOnLeave!
Please report any bugs/log output in *#support_other-cogs* on the cog support server (https://discord.gg/GET4DVk).
author: crayyy_zee
